title: IDA Pro Symbian Debugger 'general OS related' Error [closed]
content:
Closed. This question is off-topic. It is not currently accepting answers. This question does not appear to be about reverse engineering within the scope defined in the help center. Closed 11 years ago. Improve this question I am using remote symbian: c5-03 (Application TRK 3.2.7 for all S60 5.0 devices with production images). However, whenever I start the debugger, I get this error: 
general OS-related error
What went wrong? How do I solve the issue?

comments.text: You do have "root" rights to execute a debugger?
This question appears to be off-topic because it is about a bug in a software application or configuration. It should be posted on the relevant software support site.
